verbs.description: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un [V: have] left many questions unanswered as they prepare to meet in Singapore for an unprecedented summit .
[ARG0: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] have [V: left] [ARG1: many questions unanswered] [ARGM-TMP: as they prepare to meet in Singapore for an unprecedented summit] .
Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un have left many questions unanswered as [ARG0: they] [V: prepare] [ARG2: to meet in Singapore for an unprecedented summit] .
Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un have left many questions unanswered as [ARG0: they] prepare to [V: meet] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-PRP: for an unprecedented summit] .
